mapper.insert: insert into canival(c_title, c_content, c_image, c_sdate, c_edate, c_viewcnt) values (#{cTitle},#{cContent},#{cImage},#{cSdate},#{cEdate},#{cViewcnt})
mapper.update: update canival set c_title=#{cTitle}, c_content=#{cContent}, c_image=#{cImage}, c_sdate=#{cSdate}, c_edate=#{cEdate} where c_title=#{cTitle}
